BiblioData.Abstract: Libraries of nanoparticles with an amphiphilic component can be formed by mixing together two or more macromolecules In different ratios. One or more of the macromolecules may be a polymeric conjugate of a moiety to a biocompatible polymer. In some cases, the nanoparticle may contain a drug.
